title: Inventor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Invent an ability during the day and use one you have created at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Whenever you invent an ability, the host gives you an ability from a random role.

> Unless you specify otherwise, you will invent a new role every day.

> Once per game you can choose which alignment to invent an ability from.

> Once per game you may choose a subalignment to invent an ability from.

> You cannot invent an ability that harms you.
